subtasks: Insert the key into the ignition
Turn the key to start the engine

tasks.task: Attach the front loader to the combine harvester
subtasks: Align the front loader with the combine harvester's hitch
Secure the front loader to the combine harvester using the hitch mechanism

tasks.task: Operate the front loader to lift and transport materials
subtasks: Position the bucket on the front loader to pick up materials
Lift the materials using the front loader controls
Transport the materials to the desired location

tasks.task: Drive the combine harvester across the field
subtasks: Steer the combine harvester using the steering wheel or controls
Operate the throttle to control the speed of the combine harvester

tasks.task: Operate the combine harvester's cutting mechanism
subtasks: Engage the reel or cutter bar to cut the crops
Adjust the cutting height as needed

tasks.task: Operate the combine harvester's threshing and separating system
subtasks: Monitor the auger to ensure proper material flow
Adjust the concave or sieve settings to optimize grain separation
Check the rotor speed and adjust if necessary

tasks.task: Load the harvested grain into the grain tank
subtasks: Open the grain unloading door when full
Shut off the engine before unloading grain

tasks.task: Unload the harvested grain from the combine harvester
subtasks: Connect the auger to the unloading system
Start the auger to transfer grain from the combine harvester to the grain wagon
Close the unloading door after grain transfer is complete

tasks.task: Drive the combine harvester back to the field to continue operation
subtasks: Re-engage the cutting mechanism
Resume harvest operation once grain tank is empty

tasks.task: Stop the combine harvester at the end of the day
subtasks: Shut off the engine
Apply the parking brake
Disconnect the front loader if not needed immediately

tasks.task: Store the combine harvester in the barn
subtasks: Park the combine harvester in its designated spot
Engage the parking brake
Lower the combine harvester's platform or boom

tasks.task: Secure the combine harvester for storage
subtasks: Remove any attached implements or tools
Tighten the bolts or locks on the combine harvester's components
Cover the combine harvester with a tarp if necessary

tasks.task: Refuel the combine harvester if needed
subtasks: Stop the engine and allow it to cool down
Access the fuel tank and add more fuel if below the desired level

tasks.task: Service the combine harvester's operator cabin
subtasks: Open the doors or hatches to check and clean the cabin area
Vacuum the interior to remove debris and dust

tasks.task: Conduct a post-operation safety check of the combine harvester
subtasks: Check all fluids (engine oil, hydraulic fluid, etc.) and refill if necessary
Inspect tires for wear and proper air pressure
Check the condition of welding and connections on the combine harvester
Clean and check the cutting mechanism and guards for damage
